sentences.english: A member of a Berber people of northeast Algeria.
sentences.chinese: 一個撒哈拉沙漠遊牧的柏柏爾民族成員。

sentences.english: Hailing from North Africa, many Berbers are now settled in the lands of Moorish Spain.
sentences.chinese: 大量來自北非的柏柏爾人現在定居於摩爾西班牙地區。

sentences.english: A member of a nomadic Berber people of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 一個撒哈拉沙漠遊牧的柏柏爾民族成員。

sentences.english: A Berber rug makes a colourful wall-hanging.
sentences.chinese: 柏柏爾小地毯可以當色彩豔麗的壁毯。

sentences.english: The people who live there are mainly Berbers.
sentences.chinese: 居住在那裏的大部分是柏柏爾人。

sentences.english: To Arabs dominated, followed by the Berber people, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 以阿拉伯人爲主，其次是柏柏爾人等。

sentences.english: Unlike Berbers and Kurds, they have no flags or leaders.
sentences.chinese: 不像柏柏爾人和庫爾德人，他們沒有氣質或領導。
